constraints.name: connectivity
constraints.description: 操作后，相同颜色的顶点必须属于同一个连通分量（连通性约束）
constraints.formal: ∀ color c, vertices of color c must be in the same connected component after the operation

constraints.name: degree_bound
constraints.description: 树结构中每个顶点的度数不超过 n-1（度数约束）

constraints.name: cost_constraint
constraints.description: 每次操作的成本是 k * c，其中 k 是选择的颜色数量，c 是移除的顶点数量（成本约束）
constraints.formal: cost = k * c, where k is the number of chosen colors and c is the number of removed vertices
